channel.title: The Sorcerer of the Wildeeps on
channel.description: Recent content in The Sorcerer of the Wildeeps on

item.title: The Sorcerer of the Wildeeps
item.description: Whoa. Masterful use of dialect and structure to deconstruct the traditional bounds of genre and narrative. The way the characters code-switch their way through multiple registers and languages—well-known and invented—is reflected in the way the novella flips through genres like a catalog, exposing the expectations and limitations of each.

item.title: A Taste of Honey
item.description: That ending! Talk about an ending that twists everything you thought you read for the previous 159 pages (I dare say, happily so). Kai Ashante Williams [[books/the sorcerer of the wildeeps|messes with the genre bounds again]], melding psionics and telekinesis and Greek oracles as fluently as his languages.
